content.question: The data in the line graph would be least useful to a researcher interested in finding out which of the following?

choices.label: Whether or not there are ideological differences in regards to job approval of the Federal Reserve
Whether or not there was a decrease in support for the Federal Reserve after the 2008 financial crisis
The percentage of people who identify as conservative who believe the Federal Reserve caused the 2008 financial crisis
If the Federal Reserve was an institution broadly supported by liberals

content.answer: Whether or not there was a decrease in support for the Federal Reserve after the 2008 financial crisis

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain possible limitations of the data provided.
